note.p: Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1939-1941 vol 3 pp 747-759, plate, by W T Calman
References: Milo Keynes, 'Lancelot Hogben, FRS (1895-1975): A Review of his Autobiography', review of Adrian and Anne Hogben, Lancelot Hogben - Scientific Humanist in NR 1999 vol 53 pp 361-369
R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
